Package com.sri.ai.grinder.helper

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AssignmentsIterator
    An iterator over assignments to expressions according to their Type as defined in a Registry.
    AssignmentsSamplingIterator
    An assignments iterator that samples over a single variables domain.
    FunctionSignature
    A function signature containing a name and corresponding arity.
    GetType
    A Function version of looking up an expression's type given a registry.
    GrinderUtil
    General purpose utility routines related to grinder libraries.
    IsApplicationOf
    A Predicate that determines if a given expression on application has the functor specified on instantiation.
    IsolateUtil
    Utility methods for isolating a generalized linear variable.
    LazySampledFunction  
    LazySampledFunctionApplicationTopRewriter
    A TopRewriter that rewrites an expression to its value if it is a LazySampledFunction application, or delegates its rewriting to a given base TopRewriter otherwise.
    LazySampledFunctionType  
    UniquelyNamedConstantAreAllSymbolsNotIn
    A predicate indicating that uniquely named constants are all symbols not in a given collection.
    UniquelyNamedConstantIncludingBooleansAndNumbersPredicate
    A predicate based on a set of given uniquely named constants (symbols) that also implicitly include numbers and boolean constants as uniquely named constants.
